channel.title: 路透财经
channel.description: 这是一个追踪路透财经news的种子

item.title: 在问题解决之前，美国 AT&T 用户经历了超过 10 个小时的服务中断。联邦机构正与该公司合作了解原因。更多信息
item.description: AT&T users in the US grappled with over 10 hours of service disruption before the issue was resolved. Federal agencies are working with the company to understand the cause. Read more: reut.rs/3Iu1kHj

item.title: 观看：美国股市收高，英伟达（Nvidia）股价大涨 16.4%，此前该芯片设计公司预计，由于人工智能芯片需求强劲，第一季度营收将增长约三倍。
item.description: WATCH: US markets finished higher as Nvidia shares jumped 16.4% after the chip designer forecast a roughly three-fold surge in first-quarter revenue on strong demand for its AI chips reut.rs/3wys4U0

item.title: 安联集团提高股息，宣布回购股票
item.description: Allianz boosts dividends, announces share buyback reut.rs/3SRwz3y

item.title: B Riley 说，审查发现他没有参与所指控的预言资产公司的不当行为
item.description: B Riley says review found no involvement in alleged Prophecy Asset misconduct reut.rs/3IbNzMY

item.title: 受全球股市反弹提振，欧洲股市创下历史新高，日本蓝筹股日经指数也创下历史新高。更多信息
item.description: European shares rose to a record high, boosted by a rally in global stocks that also saw Japan's blue-chip Nikkei index hit an all-time high. More here reut.rs/3ORDWH2

item.title: 波音公司表示，它将立即撤换陷入困境的737 MAX项目的负责人，这是自1月5日阿拉斯加航空公司一架新的MAX 9飞机在空中发生面板爆炸事件以来，第一位重要的高管离职。更多信息
item.description: Boeing said it was replacing the head of its troubled 737 MAX program effective immediately, the first major executive departure since the Jan. 5 mid-air panel blowout of a new Alaska Airlines MAX 9. Read more reut.rs/4bLpGJO

item.title: 穆迪称红海船只袭击未推动通货膨胀
item.description: Red Sea ship attacks not driving inflation, Moody's says reut.rs/3OS7wwa

item.title: 受高利率影响，VICI Properties 预测 2024 年 FFO 低于预期
item.description: VICI Properties forecasts 2024 FFO below estimates hit by high interest rates reut.rs/3OVkBot

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：随着人工智能革命的升温，@Rob_cyran 在此阐述为何不能将英伟达 2 万亿美元的估值视为 "愚蠢的 #AI 炒作"。
item.description: From @Breakingviews: With the AI revolution heating up, here’s @rob_cyran on why Nvidia’s $2 trillion valuation cannot be dismissed as ‘silly #AI hype’

item.title: 爱迪生国际公司因费率上涨，季度利润超出预期
item.description: Edison International beats quarterly profit estimates on higher rates reut.rs/3ULLf77

item.title: 观看：标准普尔美国零售指数（S&P US retail index）所追踪的美国零售股今年迄今为止几乎没有什么波动，尽管美国消费者的购买力很强。Corient公司的艾米-江解释了其中的原因
item.description: WATCH: US retail stocks, as tracked by the S&P US retail index have barely moved so far this year, despite a resilient American consumer. Corient's Amy Kong explains why

item.title: 巴西 B3 公司第四季度净利润下降近 9
item.description: Brazil's B3 posts net profit falling almost 9% in fourth quarter reut.rs/3UTteUj

item.title: 观看：电动汽车制造商 Rivian 的股价下跌 25%，创下历史新低，而其竞争对手 Lucid 的股价则下跌 9%，因为两家公司都预测产量将出现低增长
item.description: WATCH: Shares of EV automaker Rivian tanked 25% to a record low, while its rival Lucid sank 9% after both companies forecast low production growth reut.rs/48pmBwg

item.title: 观看：梅赛德斯-奔驰（Mercedes-Benz）将其电气化目标推迟了五年，并向投资者保证将继续改进其内燃机车型，成为最新一家表示对电池动力汽车的需求低于预期的汽车制造商。
item.description: WATCH: Mercedes-Benz delayed its electrification goal by five years and assured investors it would keep sprucing up its combustion engine models, becoming the latest carmaker to flag a weaker-than-expected appetite for battery-powered cars reut.rs/49JP0y1

item.title: Breakingviews - 能源并购从大型石油公司向下游流动
item.description: Breakingviews - Energy M&A flows downstream from Big Oil reut.rs/3ORL5Ho reut.rs/3ORL5Ho

item.title: 美联储杰斐逊认为通胀取得进展，称降息与一系列广泛数据有关
item.description: Fed's Jefferson sees progress on inflation, says rate cuts linked to broad set of data reut.rs/48s532x

item.title: 观看：英伟达股价今年迄今已上涨超过 30%，与 Alphabet 竞争最有价值公司的席位
item.description: WATCH: Nvidia stock has gained more than 30% so far this year as it jockeys with Amazon.com and Alphabet for a spot among the most valuable companies reut.rs/3wsboOb

item.title: 安联集团提高股息，宣布回购股票
item.description: Allianz boosts dividends, announces share buyback reut.rs/3UKSNa8

item.title: B Riley 说，审查发现他没有参与所指控的预言资产公司的不当行为
item.description: B Riley says review found no involvement in alleged Prophecy Asset misconduct reut.rs/42LScad

item.title: 受全球股市反弹提振，欧洲股市创下历史新高，日本股市日经指数也触及历史最高水平。更多信息
item.description: European shares hit an all-time high, boosted by a rally in global stocks that also saw Japan's Nikkei touch record levels. More here reut.rs/3ORDWH2

item.title: 私募股权基金 CVC 为其第六只亚洲基金融资 68 亿美元
item.description: Private equity fund CVC raises $6.8 bln for its sixth Asia fund reut.rs/4bMivBi

item.title: 阿布扎比第一银行开始出售 5 年期债务 - IFR
item.description: First Abu Dhabi Bank starts selling 5-year debt - IFR reut.rs/3uGayg4

item.title: Glencore称，大宗商品价格下跌使该公司去年的盈利减少了一半，仅略高于170亿美元。但与力拓不同的是，该公司削减了对投资者的派息。更多信息
item.description: Glencore said lower commodity prices halved its earnings last year, pushing them down to just over $17 billion. But unlike Rio Tinto, the company slashed its payout to investors. Read more reut.rs/3UMiNBQ

item.title: 观看：亚马逊将加入道琼斯工业平均指数，从下周起取代沃尔格林博姿联盟。此举有望增加消费者零售业以及道琼斯工业平均指数中其他领域的投资。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon is set to join the Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance effective next week. The move is expected to increase consumer retail exposure as well as other areas in the Dow reut.rs/42OXJwv

item.title: 汇丰银行公布全年利润大增 78%，利率收益创下历史新高，但由于在一家中国银行的股权出现巨额减值，利润未能达到预期。更多信息
item.description: HSBC reported a 78% jump in full-year profit, a record high gain on interest rates, but missed forecasts as it was hit by a hefty impairment from its stake in a Chinese bank. Read more reut.rs/3I7xg3R

item.title: 来自 @Breakingviews：Capital One 和 Discover 的合并将在美国信用卡市场创造一个新的巨无霸。但政府对 "垃圾收费 "的打击可能会威胁到未来的盈利能力，@johnsfoley 解释道。
item.description: From @Breakingviews: The Capital One and Discover merger will create a new behemoth in the US credit card market. But the government’s war against ‘junk fees’ could threaten future profitability, explains @johnsfoley

item.title: 汇丰银行 30 亿美元中国减记损了创纪录的年度利润
item.description: HSBC's $3 billion China writedown mars record annual profit reut.rs/49mUgaW

item.title: 观看：沃尔玛以强劲的第四季度业绩拉开了美国零售商报告季的序幕，此前受通胀挤压的购物者纷纷涌入沃尔玛商店，沃尔玛还表示将以 23 亿美元收购智能电视制造商 Vizio。
item.description: WATCH: Walmart kicked off US retailers' reporting season with robust fourth quarter results after inflation-squeezed shoppers flocked to its stores and said it would buy smart-TV maker Vizio for $2.3 billion reut.rs/3I79ZyY

item.title: 阿布扎比第一银行开始出售 5 年期债务 - IFR
item.description: First Abu Dhabi Bank starts selling 5-year debt - IFR reut.rs/3T6hzQK

item.title: 观看：亚马逊将加入道琼斯工业平均指数，取代沃尔格林博姿联盟（Walgreens Boots Alliance），下周生效。消息公布后，亚马逊股价在盘后交易中上涨了 1.3%，而沃尔格林则下跌了 3%。
item.description: WATCH: Amazon is set to join the Dow Jones Industrial Average, replacing Walgreens Boots Alliance effective next week. The shares of Amazon rose 1.3% in extended trade after the announcement, while Walgreens dipped 3% reut.rs/42OXJwv
